pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe sattarasavaggiyā dārakā sahāyakā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.5: “kena nu kho upāyena upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya na ca kilameyyā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.7: “sace kho upāli lekhaṃ sikkheyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.9: “sace kho upāli lekhaṃ sikkhissati, aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.10: Sace kho upāli gaṇanaṃ sikkheyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.12: “sace kho upāli gaṇanaṃ sikkhissati, urassa dukkho bhavissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.13: Sace kho upāli rūpaṃ sikkheyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.15: “sace kho upāli rūpaṃ sikkhissati, akkhīni dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.16: Ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.17: Sace kho upāli samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.18: Assosi kho upālidārako mātāpitūnaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.19: Atha kho upālidārako yena te dārakā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te dārake etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.21: “Sace kho tvaṃ, ayya, pabbajissasi, evaṃ mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.22: Atha kho te dārakā ekamekassa mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.35: No ce bhavissati yāgu vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā, piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjissathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.36: Evampi kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā rodantiyeva—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.39: Assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya dārakasaddaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.42: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.43: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.44: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.47: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.48: Ūnakavīsativasso, bhikkhave, puggalo akkhamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṃ duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ anadhivāsakajātiko hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.49: Vīsativassova kho, bhikkhave, puggalo khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.52: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:1.53: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, idaṃ tasmiṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:2.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:2.1.9: “Upasampādessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariyaṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc65:2.1.13: Gaṇassa ca ācariyassa ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
